divs: Sighting DetailsUFO sighting,, Tuesday 8-30-2011.....,definately a UFO..very close....approx 500 to 1000 feet...hovering then slowly moved..then stopped..no noise....pulsating light of red, yellow and orange...shaped like a cube. Watched it for 10 minutes then it started to move away again and suddenly disappeared.DEFINITELY not a balloon, airplane, flare, helicopter, planet, meteor etc. Time:: 10:15 pm....intersection of Lampson Rd and Route 48....Lysander. NY. Clear sky...no wind.....78 degrees. Observed by myself and daughter .....we were headed north on Route 48 after leaving the New York State Fair. We saw it first while in motion and pulled over at intersection, got out of the car and walked into a field and and observed it for approximately 10 minutes. Tried taking pics with a cell phone camera but they didn't pick up enough light. The above was summiteed by Stephen Cox, Chief Field Investigator NY Mufon
trends: There have been no other sightings in Lysander
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
Summary: UFO sighting,, very close....approx 500 to 1000 feet
